column5: Finally got to meet Spincast this summer. Had a great time out on the lake.  Thank you Rick and Kevin for sharing your boat with me, here is the video I promised a hundred years agoâ€¦.lol.
what a great way to start my morning, Thanks for putting that together Simon,,,,,. Great memories.Looking forward to the next time I can get up that way

what a great way to start my morning, Thanks for putting that together Simon,,,,,. Great memories.Looking forward to the next time I can get up that way   Was fun for sure! You know you are welcome anytime:)  Say hi to Kevin from me.
Thanks for sharing Simon. Nice to see three guys enjoying our natural resources.
